pages.text: Inventory lists show you exactly what's inside the warehouse and where it is stored. $(br2) Crafting an empty inventory list, or resetting a written inventory list on the workbench, and giving it to the maid (throw it to her, right-click on her, or even open your backpack and put it in!) $(br) After writing it, the maid will throw the inventory list out.

pages.title: Looking for something
pages.text: When viewing the inventory list, you can click on an item to have its storage location marked, which is very handy when looking for items.
